item.title: About Me
item.description:
I’m Michaelâ€”an engineer and graduate student with a passion for aerospace and 3D design. I enjoy solving problems, whether through software development, mechanical design, or exploring orbital mechanics. My work and studies focus on understanding spacecraft technologies and their role in space exploration.

Background

I earned my bachelor’s degree in Engineering Science with a focus on Computer Engineering from the University of Western Ontario and am currently pursuing a master’s in Aerospace Engineering at Sofia University. I also work at Cisco Systems, specializing in VoIP technologies and software development in C++ and Swift.
